array.string: Set the toolâ€™s `onFingerMoved` property to the full name of an event handler function. For example:\ `fruitTool.onFingerMoved = addFruit(touch:)`
Add the tool to the scene:\ `scene.tools.append(fruitTool)`

dict.string:
### Congratulations!
**Challenge:** Try writing your own `onFingerMoved` function, and add a new tool to call it.
[**Next Page**](@next)
